ComicInfo.Title: Notes #32; Mama Drama!; Dr. Mary Walker; The first I ever read about Mary Walker...; I Was a Failure as a Woman
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 00:38:39. [CVDB164611] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 22:45:54. [Issue ID 170745]
ComicInfo.Summary:
After her Uncle Milt's funeral, Midge stays overnight with her mom and is treated to non-stop nagging while busily thinking about whether she'll inherit any money. She's surprised to learn that mom and Aunt Hazel are going on a cruise.
Biography of one of the earliest American women doctors, also active in the clothing-reform and suffrage movements, who received the Medal of Honor for medical work during the Civil War.
Describes researching and creating the previous story
